flask.name: Flask
flask.description: A flask used to increment your health from one point to another. How much does it increment it by? +100 HP!

hotsauce.name: Hot Sauce
hotsauce.description: It's really weird why random mobs would be carrying this item. Like what could they possibly use this for?

cure.name: Antidote
cure.description: Are you poisoned? Have you been involved in a fight with a poisonous snake or venomous spider? Well this is the cure for you!

manaflask.name: Mana Flask
manaflask.description: A refreshing drink for those a little bit low on mana! +35 MP!

burger.name: Burger
burger.description: How did a burger make its way into a fantasy world? Who knows, but it's delicious! +200 HP!

bigflask.name: Big Flask
bigflask.description: It's like the other flask, except it's bigger, so obviously it must heal more! +250 HP!

bigmanaflask.name: Big Mana Flask
bigmanaflask.description: For those seriously thirsty for some mana! +95 MP!

firepotion.name: Fire Potion
firepotion.description: Feeling a little hot? Have you been burnt to a crisp and can't seem to shake off that burning sensation? The fire potion is the answer to your ailments!

cd.name: CD [Quest]
cd.description: A CD received by some dying soldier Private Ryan. Contains his last mixtape. I should probably get this to his Sexy wife or something.

snowpotion.name: Snow Potion
snowpotion.description: A magical potion received by some weird monument. It temporarily prevents the player from taking damage from the cold.

blackpotion.name: Black Potion
blackpotion.description: This potion is not at all suspicious. Drink up, it's really yummy!

gold.name: Gold
gold.description: A very useful shiny metal that for some reason people like to exchange for goods.

token.name: Token
token.description: A special token that can be exchanged for special stuff at a special store somewhere special.

banana.name: Banana
banana.description: A banana, a fruit that is yellow and long. It is a good source of potassium and fiber.

watermelon.name: Watermelon
watermelon.description: A watermelon, I should probably cut this up before eating it.

apple.name: Apple
apple.description: An apple, an excellent source of energy!

orange.name: Orange
orange.description: It's funny, the name of the fruit is the same as the colour and its colour.

blueberry.name: Blueberry
blueberry.description: A blueberry, a fruit that is blue and round. It is a good source of antioxidants.

shardt1.name: Shard - Tier 1
shardt1.description: Shards are items used to enchant equipments. Each tier represents the maximum attainable enchantment level and chance of enchanting succeeding.

shardt2.name: Shard - Tier 2
shardt2.description: Shards are items used to enchant equipments. Each tier represents the maximum attainable enchantment level and chance of enchanting succeeding.

shardt3.name: Shard - Tier 3
shardt3.description: Shards are items used to enchant equipments. Each tier represents the maximum attainable enchantment level and chance of enchanting succeeding.

shardt4.name: Shard - Tier 4
shardt4.description: Shards are items used to enchant equipments. Each tier represents the maximum attainable enchantment level and chance of enchanting succeeding.

shardt5.name: Shard - Tier 5
shardt5.description: Shards are items used to enchant equipments. Each tier represents the maximum attainable enchantment level and chance of enchanting succeeding.

knife.name: Knife
knife.description: A versatile cutting tool that will primarily be used for fletching and stuff.

string.name: String
string.description: A piece of string, can probably be used to make things with it.

logs.name: Logs
logs.description: Ah yes, the classic logs. Looking at them I can see that they're made out of wood.

palmlogs.name: Palm Logs
palmlogs.description: Funny enough, these logs are made out of palm wood. Which is not the same as the other kinds of wood.

pinelogs.name: Pine Logs
pinelogs.description: I think I found these when I accidentally swung my axe at a tree repeatedly until it fell down.

icelogs.name: Ice Logs
icelogs.description: These logs are made out of ice. They're very cold to the touch. No matter what, they will not thaw. I wonder what happens when you put it in fire.

icepalmlogs.name: Ice Palm Logs
icepalmlogs.description: These logs are made out of ice and palm wood. They're very cold to the touch.

icepinelogs.name: Ice Pine Logs
icepinelogs.description: I think I found these when I accidentally swung my axe at a tree repeatedly until it fell down.

willowlogs.name: Willow Logs
willowlogs.description: Classic type of wood. It's hard, it's strong, you can use it for a lot of things. But for now I guess I can sell it.

bloodwoodlogs.name: Bloodwood Logs
bloodwoodlogs.description: It almost looks like they're crying blood.

nisocore.name: Nisoc Ore
nisocore.description: An ancient rock forming in volcanic areas. Generally used for crafting pendants and rings, and perhaps other things.

cinnabarore.name: Cinnabar Ore
cinnabarore.description: A red ore containing special metals. May be used for crafting of certain weapons.

pytharore.name: Pythar Ore
pytharore.description: A purple crystal with magical properties.

goldnugget.name: Gold Ore
goldnugget.description: Raw gold ore, will need to be processed before it can be turned into something nice.

iboore.name: Ibo Ore
iboore.description: A peculiar ore. Its uses are not well understood, perhaps with further research it can be used for something.

moonrockore.name: Space Rock
moonrockore.description: Part of an Astroid that fell from the sky 172,000 Earthling years ago. Must be special!

bead.name: Magic Bead
bead.description: A bead that emanates magical properties. Can be used in conjunction with other items to create magical items.

lightningbead.name: Lightning Bead
lightningbead.description: A magical bead imbued with lightning properties. Can be used to craft magical items.

naturebead.name: Magic Bead
naturebead.description: A magical bead imbued with the power of nature. Can be used to craft magical items.

firebead.name: Magic Bead
firebead.description: A magical bead imbued with fire. Can be used to craft magical items.

icebead.name: Magic Bead
icebead.description: A strong magical bead perpetually frozen. Can be used to craft magical items.

stick.name: Shaft
stick.description: A stick. It's a stick. What else do you want me to say about it? You can probably use it to craft stuff now that it has been added in the game.

feather.name: Feather
feather.description: A feather, I think it came off of a bird or something. You could make arrows with this thing.

candykey.name: Candy Key
candykey.description: A key that allows entrance into Santa's secret chamber. Crumbles upon entering.

boostpotion.name: Boost Potion
boostpotion.description: Drinking this will probably speed up your attack rate for a short period of time. I think.

accuracypotion.name: Accuracy Potion
accuracypotion.description: If there's one thing I know is that potions in this world are always sketchy and do something else from what their name implies. I hope that's not the case here.

defensepotion.name: Defence Potion
defensepotion.description: Drinking this will make give you some serious defense for a short period of time.

strengthpotion.name: Strength Potion
strengthpotion.description: Do you wanna partake in maximum damage contests? This potion is probably your best friend.

beermug.name: Beer
beermug.description: Nothing is quite as refreshing as a beer, though this may potentially inhibit your accuracy for a wee bit.

clamobject.name: Clam
clamobject.description: It has a hard outer shell but I bet it's yummy inside.

clamchowder.name: Clam Chowder
clamchowder.description: A delicious soup made from clams. It's a bit salty though.

rawshrimp.name: Raw Shrimp
rawshrimp.description: Maybe if I cook this it'll become something actually edible.

cookedshrimp.name: Cooked Shrimp
cookedshrimp.description: A singular cooked shrimp, alone and dead. But still delicious.

jellyfish.name: Jellyfish
jellyfish.description: Did you know that jellyfish don't actually have a brain. So don't feel so bad about yourself!

jellyfishsmoothie.name: Jellyfish Smoothie
jellyfishsmoothie.description: I can't believe someone would actually think up to create something like this.

kelp.name: Kelp
kelp.description: Kelp is a type of seaweed that grows in water. It's pretty tasty when combined with other stuff.

rawbeef.name: Raw Beef
rawbeef.description: A piece of raw beef. It's probably not the best idea to eat it raw.

rawtuna.name: Raw Tuna
rawtuna.description: A fish that is commonly found in water. It's pretty tasty when cooked.

tunasushi.name: Tuna Sushi
tunasushi.description: A delicious sushi made from tuna. Probably the best in-game food at the moment, or not, who knows, I'm just a piece of text.

barley.name: Barley
barley.description: It's a fruit, no it's a sald, no it's a grain. You can probably use it to make bread or something like that.

blackberry.name: Blackberry
blackberry.description: A berry that grows on bushes. It's pretty tasty when cooked.

borth.name: Borth
borth.description: A nice yummy warm and nice smelling... I really don't know what it is.

bronzebar.name: Bronze Bar
bronzebar.description: A bar of bronze. It's pretty heavy.

bronzeore.name: Bronze Ore
bronzeore.description: A piece of bronze ore. It's pretty heavy.

bucket.name: Bucket
bucket.description: A bucket, you can use it to put a variety of liquids in it.

cake.name: Cake
cake.description: A delicious cake. It's pretty tasty.

cheese.name: Cheese
cheese.description: A piece of cheese. I think it came from milk.

cilantro.name: Cilantro
cilantro.description: A leafy herb that is commonly used in Mexican cuisine. It's pretty tasty when cooked.

cloudberry.name: Cloudberry
cloudberry.description: A berry that grows on bushes. It's pretty tasty when cooked.

coal.name: Coal
coal.description: A piece of coal. You can use it smelt ores.

rawchicken.name: Raw Chicken
rawchicken.description: I think I should cook this before I eat it.

cookedchicken.name: Cooked Chicken
cookedchicken.description: A delicious piece of chicken. It's pretty tasty.

cookedbeef.name: Cooked Beef
cookedbeef.description: A scrumptious piece of beef. You can eat it and it'll heal you.

rawpork.name: Raw Pork
rawpork.description: I think I should cook this before I eat it.

cookedpork.name: Cooked Pork
cookedpork.description: A delicious piece of pork. It's pretty tasty.

rawsausage.name: Raw Sausage
rawsausage.description: I think I should cook this before I eat it.

cookedsausage.name: Cooked Sausage
cookedsausage.description: A delicious sausage. It's pretty tasty.

copperbar.name: Copper Bar
copperbar.description: A bar of copper. It's pretty heavy.

copperore.name: Copper Ore
copperore.description: A piece of copper ore. It's pretty heavy.

corn.name: Corn
corn.description: It's corn, and it's on a cob.

egg.name: Egg
egg.description: A wonderful sorta round egg, it came from a chicken, I think.

goldore.name: Gold Ore
goldore.description: A piece of gold ore. It's pretty heavy.

gooseberry.name: Gooseberry
gooseberry.description: A berry that grows on bushes. It's pretty tasty when cooked.

ironbar.name: Iron Bar
ironbar.description: A bar of iron. It's pretty heavy.

mango.name: Mango
mango.description: A mango, it's a fruit and it's edible

milkbottle.name: Milk Bottle
milkbottle.description: A bottle of milk. It's pretty tasty when cooked.

mulberry.name: Mulberry
mulberry.description: A berry that grows on or in bushes.

oat.name: Oat
oat.description: A grain that is commonly used in bread.

peach.name: Peach
peach.description: A peach, it's a fruit and it's edible

pineapple.name: Pineapple
pineapple.description: A pineapple, it's a fruit and it's edible

plum.name: Plum
plum.description: A plum, it's a fruit and it's edible

quinoa.name: Quinoa
quinoa.description: Hello this is the developer, I really don't know what this is even used in so I can't come up with a witty description.

raspberry.name: Raspberry
raspberry.description: A berry that grows on or around bushes..

rice.name: Rice
rice.description: You can eat this after you cook it for a bit.

strawberry.name: Strawberry
strawberry.description: A berry that grows on bushes.

tinbar.name: Tin Bar
tinbar.description: A bar of tin. It's pretty heavy.

goldbar.name: Gold Bar
goldbar.description: A bar of gold. It's pretty heavy and shiny.

tofu.name: Tofu
tofu.description: A block of tofu. I don't know what to do with this, I'm not vegan.

tomato.name: Tomato
tomato.description: A tomato, it's a fruit and it's edible. Yes it's a fruit get over it.

onion.name: Onion
onion.description: An onion, it has layers, like an ogre.

potato.name: Potato
potato.description: A potato, it's a vegetable and it's edible, though cooking it might be better.

chilli.name: Chilli
chilli.description: A chilli pepper, it's hot so be careful.

waterbucket.name: Water Bucket
waterbucket.description: A bucket of water. You can use it to cook stuff with it.

bowlsmall.name: Small Bowl
bowlsmall.description: A small bowl. Can be used to cook stuff in it.

bowlmedium.name: Medium Bowl
bowlmedium.description: A medium bowl. Can be used to cook stuff in it.

topaz.name: Topaz
topaz.description: A topaz gemstome, it's quite pretty.

lapislazuli.name: Lapis Lazuli
lapislazuli.description: A semi-precious stone, it's quite pretty.

citrine.name: Citrine
citrine.description: It's rather shiny and nice to hold.

taaffeite.name: Taaffeite
taaffeite.description: A nice purple gemstone that is somewhat valuable I guess.

ruby.name: Ruby
ruby.description: A very nice gemstone that can be used to made rings or pendants.

peridot.name: Peridot
peridot.description: A nice green gemstone that is somewhat valuable I guess.

opal.name: Opal
opal.description: A nice gemstone that is somewhat valuable I guess.

emerald.name: Emerald
emerald.description: A very nice gemstone that can be used to made rings or pendants.

amethyst.name: Amethyst
amethyst.description: A nice purple gemstone that is somewhat valuable I guess.

bluelily.name: Blue Lily
bluelily.description: A blue lily, a flower that can be used for crafting stuff.

stew.name: Tomato Stew
stew.description: A stew composed of tomato, mushrooms, and a bowl.

stew2.name: Corn Stew
stew2.description: A very filling stew, possibly the best stew currently available.

mushroom1.name: Shiitake
mushroom1.description: A mushroom that can be used for cooking.

mushroom2.name: Russula
mushroom2.description: A mushroom that can be used for cooking.

mushroom3.name: Kuriositas
mushroom3.description: A mushroom that can be used for cooking.

mushroom4.name: Matsutake
mushroom4.description: A mushroom that can be used for cooking.

mushroom5.name: Cortinarius
mushroom5.description: A mushroom that can be used for cooking.

mushroom6.name: Violet Cort
mushroom6.description: A mushroom that can be used for cooking.

hilt1.name: Hilt
hilt1.description: May be used with certain metals to produce a sword.

hilt2.name: Hilt
hilt2.description: May be used with certain metals to produce a sword.

ratpet.name: Rat Pet
ratpet.description: A little cute rat that follows you around.

rathatpet.name: Rat Hat Pet
rathatpet.description: A little cute rat with a little cute hat that follows you around.
